content.raw: If you don't pass an Id, it will invalid forever, otherwise will be valid. I have updated the doc in 38d83f7. I believe that we made the Id optional in the `Edge` constructor to make it consistent with the `Vertex` class. Now, I think that we should restore it as it was, and forget the `Valid()` method in the `Edge` class. I can make the change here or in the next pull request if it makes sense.
content.html: If you don't pass an Id, it will invalid forever, otherwise will be valid. I have updated the doc in 38d83f7. I believe that we made the Id optional in the Edge constructor to make it consistent with the Vertex class. Now, I think that we should restore it as it was, and forget the Valid() method in the Edge class. I can make the change here or in the next pull request if it makes sense.
